languages.text: "Казна пустеет, навигаторы разрознены, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-маршруты перемешались, и многие наши союзники потеряли с нами связь. Вот почему так важно поскорее окончить обучение дитя — Кассия обязана привести Дом к процветанию, как только займет место Тисифоны. Это ее великое предназначение!"

traits.locale_text: "Казна пустеет, навигаторы разрознены, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-маршруты перемешались, и многие наши союзники потеряли с нами связь. Вот почему так важно поскорее окончить обучение дитя — Кассия обязана привести Дом к процветанию, как только займет место Тисифоны. Это ее великое предназначение!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "The treasury is empty, the Navigators are scattered, the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes are scrambled, and many of our allies cannot be reached. Which is why it is so important to complete the child's education — it is Cassia's duty to take Tisiphone's place and lead the House to prosperity. Such is her great destiny!"
languages.original_text: "Казна пустеет, навигаторы разрознены, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-маршруты перемешались, и многие наши союзники потеряли с нами связь. Вот почему так важно поскорее окончить обучение дитя — Кассия обязана привести Дом к процветанию, как только займет место Тисифоны. Это ее великое предназначение!"

Which is why it is so important to complete the child's education — it is Cassia's duty to take Tisiphone's place and bring the Great House to prosperity. Such is her great destiny!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

Which is why it is so important to complete the child's education — it is Cassia's duty to take Tisiphone's place and lead the House to prosperity. Such is her great destiny!"

Which is why it is so important to complete the child's education — it is Cassia's duty to take Tisiphone's place and lead the House to prosperity. Such is her great destiny!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “家族国库一贫如洗，导航者四散各地。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}航线遭到了扰乱，许多盟友也无法联系。这就是为什么那孩子的教育是如此重要。卡西娅有责任接替提西福涅的位置，带领家族走向繁荣。这就是她伟大的命运！”
languages.original_text: "The treasury is empty, the Navigators are scattered, the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes are scrambled, and many of our allies cannot be reached. Which is why it is so important to complete the child's education — it is Cassia's duty to take Tisiphone's place and lead the House to prosperity. Such is her great destiny!"

traits.locale_text: “家族国库一贫如洗，导航者四散各地。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}航线遭到了扰乱，许多盟友也无法联系。这就是为什么那孩子的教育是如此重要。卡西娅有责任接替提西福涅的位置，带领家族走向繁荣。这就是她伟大的命运！”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «La tesorería está vacía, los Navegantes están dispersos, las rutas por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} están distorsionadas y no podemos contactar con muchos de nuestros aliados. Por eso es tan importante que terminemos la educación de la niña. El papel de Cassia es ocupar el puesto de Tisiphone y liderar la casa hacia la prosperidad. ¡Es su grandioso destino!».
languages.original_text: "The treasury is empty, the Navigators are scattered, the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes are scrambled, and many of our allies cannot be reached. Which is why it is so important to complete the child's education — it is Cassia's duty to take Tisiphone's place and lead the House to prosperity. Such is her great destiny!"

traits.locale_text: «La tesorería está vacía, los Navegantes están dispersos, las rutas por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} están distorsionadas y no podemos contactar con muchos de nuestros aliados. Por eso es tan importante que terminemos la educación de la niña. El papel de Cassia es ocupar el puesto de Tisiphone y liderar la casa hacia la prosperidad. ¡Es su grandioso destino!».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「国庫は底を尽き、航宙士は散り散りとなり、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}航路は寸断され、多くの同盟者とも連絡が取れない。だからこそ、この子の教育を完成させることが重要なのだ。ティシフォンの後を継ぎ、家門を繁栄へと導くのはカシアの義務です。それが彼女の偉大な運命なのだ！」
languages.original_text: "The treasury is empty, the Navigators are scattered, the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes are scrambled, and many of our allies cannot be reached. Which is why it is so important to complete the child's education — it is Cassia's duty to take Tisiphone's place and lead the House to prosperity. Such is her great destiny!"

traits.locale_text: 「国庫は底を尽き、航宙士は散り散りとなり、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}航路は寸断され、多くの同盟者とも連絡が取れない。だからこそ、この子の教育を完成させることが重要なのだ。ティシフォンの後を継ぎ、家門を繁栄へと導くのはカシアの義務です。それが彼女の偉大な運命なのだ！」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Die Schatzkammer ist leer, die Navigatoren sind versprengt, die {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Routen sind gestört, und viele unserer Verbündeten sind nicht erreichbar. Darum ist es ja so wichtig, die Ausbildung des Kindes abzuschließen – es ist Cassias Pflicht, Tisiphones Platz einzunehmen und das Haus zum Wohlstand zu führen. Das ist ihr großes Schicksal!"
languages.original_text: "The treasury is empty, the Navigators are scattered, the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes are scrambled, and many of our allies cannot be reached. Which is why it is so important to complete the child's education — it is Cassia's duty to take Tisiphone's place and lead the House to prosperity. Such is her great destiny!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Schatzkammer ist leer, die Navigatoren sind versprengt, die {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Routen sind gestört, und viele unserer Verbündeten sind nicht erreichbar. Darum ist es ja so wichtig, die Ausbildung des Kindes abzuschließen – es ist Cassias Pflicht, Tisiphones Platz einzunehmen und das Haus zum Wohlstand zu führen. Das ist ihr großes Schicksal!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Nos caisses sont vides, les navigateurs éparpillés aux quatre coins de la galaxie, les routes {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} entremêlées, et nombre de nos alliés injoignables. Il est donc d'une importance capitale que cette Enfant achève ses études et prenne la place de Tisiphone à la tête de notre maison pour restaurer sa prospérité. Tel est son destin ! »
languages.original_text: "The treasury is empty, the Navigators are scattered, the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes are scrambled, and many of our allies cannot be reached. Which is why it is so important to complete the child's education — it is Cassia's duty to take Tisiphone's place and lead the House to prosperity. Such is her great destiny!"

traits.locale_text: « Nos caisses sont vides, les navigateurs éparpillés aux quatre coins de la galaxie, les routes {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} entremêlées, et nombre de nos alliés injoignables. Il est donc d'une importance capitale que cette enfant achève ses études et prenne la place de Tisiphone à la tête de notre maison pour restaurer sa prospérité. Tel est son destin ! »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Hazine boş, Rotacılar sağa sola dağıldı, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} rotaları parçalandı, çoğu müttefikimiz de ulaşılamaz durumda. Çocuğun eğitimini tamamlamak bu yüzden bu kadar önemli. Tisiphone'nin yerini almak ve Hane'yi refaha kavuşturmak, Cassia'nın vazifesi. Bu onun kaderinde yazılı!"
languages.original_text: "The treasury is empty, the Navigators are scattered, the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes are scrambled, and many of our allies cannot be reached. Which is why it is so important to complete the child's education — it is Cassia's duty to take Tisiphone's place and lead the House to prosperity. Such is her great destiny!"

traits.locale_text: "Hazine boş, Rotacılar dağıldı, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} rotaları parçalandı ve müttefiklerimizin çoğu ulaşılamaz durumda. Çocuğun eğitimini tamamlamak bu yüzden bu kadar önemli. Tisiphone'nin yerini almak ve Hane'yi refaha kavuşturmak Cassia'nın vazifesi. Bu onun kaderinde var!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
